title: Bug splat  for  an account!
body: My  friend  experince this issue  only  when he logged HIS account. He is getting bug splat only when  he try to login to  his account. We tried every  possible fix out there. Ä°s  anyone had this  problem  out there? thank you  for the hep {{sticker:sg-janna}}

replies.body:
I would recommend posting over on the more active EU boards or submitting a ticket to Player Support for help with this issue.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

I have the same problem and many other players too since 8.4... A friend even tried my account on his computer and got bugsplat too as soon as he pressed enter to log in, I think only riot can fix that
I'm having the same problem on my EUW account since yesterday when I patched for 8.4...
